title: Ghosted Udyr with Maxed Bear Stance can't keep up with Kalista.
body: And yes I built Randuins. Wtf is wrong with this stupid champion. Even if I jumped her from a bush she'd just escape, and then continue to kite me. Kiting is already annoying as hell, Kalista makes it 1000x worse. At one point she actually kited my whole team at once, and killed our Janna. The only way I can seriously think of beating her is Lissandra putting big fat frozen tomb on her, even then she'd probably dash away.

replies.body: When you have a champ that even Yi ulti + ghostblade and still can't even get in range to cast alpha strike before expiring unless you attack from fog (ie. brushes) where she can't see you coming, you know you did something wrong.

That is a huge hyperbole. He has anti slow as Udyr doesn't and Udyr is known for having a lot better sticking potential than Yi in a drawn out fight while being a lot tankier. Yi countering Kalista is a thing and always has been. The problem is when she counters people like Udyr who have 0 gap closers other than MS ones being kited because miss infinite slows and escapes.

Yi doesn't actually counter Kalista, which just like I said in my post, Kalista has too much gapcloser and disengage/kite.

If you run up to her as Yi, you'll die horribly. Attack from places she can't see then you MIGHT have a chance unless you're so fed she dies right after an alpha.

Udyr on the other hand, stands no chance against Kalista since he has to physically run up to her and he also lacks reliable burst unless ofc he is fed, otherwise he is a sustain damage champ which only makes matters worse.

The difference between Udyr and Kalista is that, while they both shine in extended fights and chases, Udyr has costs and drawbacks, Kalista has none (she also has burst).

You do realize that there is a soft cap on move speed? You don't actually attain that level of speed (I'll even throw in Trinity force and it's rage passive, heck, even alacrity enchant and swifties for the benefit of the doubt). 345+60+20=425, with the cap, this gets reduced to 423 MS. Add in the 8% from trinity Force and you get 448.5 after the soft cap Throw in Bear stance and Ghost and you get all the way up to 578.5 MS, and then Rage passive gets added on after, bringing it up to 588.5 MS. That is with 35 extra flat MS from taking Swifties and alacrity over normal boots and any other enchantment, as well as Trinity force's 8% bonus MS and rage passive, and you still are nowhere near the amount that you thought you had. It is pretty freaking fast, but not outrun a Kalista fast. Kalista's dash scales with move speed (better boots = longer dash range), gets increased by 25% when dashing away from her target (like when kiting), and happens as frequently as she can attack. If she has 2.0 attack speed, that is 2 long dashes EVERY second when well played, which get increased when kiting away from an enemy. They need to leave the dash's scaling with boots and AS, but remove the extra range for kiting away, or nerf the base range to begin with.
